      • authenticateUser

        @RequestMapping(value="/authenticate",
                method=POST)
public User authenticateUser(@RequestParam(value="username")
                                   java.lang.String username,
                                   @RequestParam(value="passwd")
                                   java.lang.String passwd)
        Parameters:
        username - of the user
        passwd - to login
        Returns:
        details of the user upon successful authentication.
        status 200 - Ok
        status 500 - invalid credentials
        status 510 - internal error

      • registerUser

        @RequestMapping(value="/register",
                method=POST)
public User registerUser(@RequestParam
                               java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> params)
        Parameters:
        params - map of required attributes for registering user see UserService.registerUser(Map) method
        Returns:
        User model containing registered user information
        status 200 - Ok
        status 501 - Malformed Arguments
        status 505 - Username already exists
        status 510 - internal error

        Parameters:

        Returns:
